features.featureDescription: Data plane actions support authentication using managed identities.
features.featureGuidance: Each Azure Policy assignment can be associated with only one managed identity. However, the managed identity can be assigned multiple roles. Configuration occurs in two steps: first create either a system-assigned or user-assigned managed identity, then grant it the necessary roles.
features.customerActionsDescription: Manage application identities securely and automatically
